Because i had buy new server from OVH so I want to resell this plan for $55 by Paypal or WebMoney (I had contact to VPSDIME before that I explain for this, they agree for me to transfer this plan to another account from them) 
Recurring amount is $84 per year and now in site http://vpsdime.com/ price per year is $88 so you can save $4 and if buy this plan from me you can save $33 for 12 month
thanks you for reading this.
